summary:
Fëanor, an Elf from *The Silmarillion*, was an inventor and skilled craftsman. He made the Tengwar writing system, palantír stones, and the Silmarils, precious gems that caused much conflict. After his Silmarils were stolen, he and his sons vowed to get them back, leading to battles and even attacks on fellow Elves.

Fëanor's pride and desire for creation were his downfall. Scholars compare him to historical figures whose pride led to their demise. His story reflects the consequences of unchecked ambition and the power of creation, both for good and destruction.
title: Fëanor
